SENT.plain: The adverse effects of regimes in cancer treatment have forced us to change to new targeted therapy options

Understanding these side effects, which can lead to discontinuation of the new therapy strategies, will allow the clinical management of these side effects and result in continuing therapies with effective medications
Bevacizumab, which is an IgG1 antibody against vascular endothelial growth factor, has side effects such as proteinuria, hypertension, venous and arterial thromboembolic events, and hemorrhage
This is the first reported case of dural sinus vein thrombosis, during the treatment with bevacizumab
